Crypto teaches people how prices actually work.  If you buy one gallon of milk, price is a constant.  But if you want to buy 1000 gallons, you first empty out the cheapest store A at price X. Then store B is emptied out at price (X+dx). Prices rise as you buy more.  Same for BTC.
